documents.name: Privacy & Policy
documents.text:
Welcome to Boomer.host Privacy &. Policy

Your privacy is important to us. It is DFDB LLC's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, https://boomer.host/, and other sites we own and operate.


We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.

We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorised access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.

We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law or when it's in our best interest to do so to maintain a good public image.

Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please beaware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies.

The third-party service provider we may share your data with, and what we share is listed below:

Paypal/stripe/fraudlabs except card details. Customer name, address, email address, IP address and card details for the purpose of payment processing.

You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services.

Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of ourpractices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us.

  • Privacy policy
© 2021 DFDB LLC, all rights reserved

documents.name: Terms
documents.text:
Welcome to Boomer.host Terms &. conditions

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of DFDB LLC's website and use of DFDB LLC’s online hosting and domain services. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full. Do not continue to use DFDB LLC’s website and services if you do not accept all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.


The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and any or all Agreements:“Client”, “You” and “Your” refers to you, the person accessing this website and accepting the Company’s terms and conditions. “The Company”, “Ourselves”,“We”, “Our” and “Us”, refers to our Company. All terms apply to the offer, acceptance, and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of Our services to the Client in the most appropriate manner with respectof the provision of theCompany’s stated services/products.

Cookies

We employ the use of cookies. By using DFDB LLC’s website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with DFDB LLC’s privacy policy. Most of the modern day interactive web sites use cookies to enable us to retrieve userdetails for each visit. Cookies are used in some areas of our site to enable the functionality of this area and ease of use for those people visiting our website and using our hosting services. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners mayalso use cookies.

Reservation of Rights

We reserve the right at any time and in its sole discretion to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our website. You agree to immediately remove all links to our website upon such request. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions and its linking policy at any time. By continuing to link to our website, you agree to be bound to and abide by these linking terms and conditions.

Content Liability

We shall have no responsibility or liability for any content appearing on your website(s)/vps(s) and any content you choose to host on our server. You agreeto indemnify and defend us against all claims arising out of or based upon your website(s). No link(s) or content may appear on anypage on your website(s) or within any context containing content or materials that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights.

All the following usages is also prohibited on all of our server(s). CryptoCurrency Mining, Terrorist activities, Security exploits, Email spam, Phishing, DDoS/DoS attacks

Refund Policy

All of our services do not include any money back guarantee and all purchases are final. You can cancel your subscription at anytime, that will result in you no longer being billed in the future.

In case of chargeback you will be liable for any costs associated with that, including but not limited to the extra time it takes to resolve the problem.

Disclaimer

All services provided by DFDB LLC are for the expressed use of Clients within reasonable limitations as deemed by Company members. We reserve the right to terminate your membership at any time if you break any of our terms and conditions. We reserve the right to change the price of our services for the next billing period at our discretion at any time.

All our services are unmanaged. If you contact us you need to be sure that the issue is caused by us otherwise you may be billed as is appropriate for the labor cost regarding your case
